scripts.compile-sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map style.css.map assets/sass/style.scss style.css && autoprefixer style.css
scripts.build-js: find assets/js/ -name '*.js' | xargs cat | uglifyjs -o scripts.min.js
scripts.build-images: npm run svg-to-png && npm run optimise-images
scripts.watch: livereload & npm run watch-sass && npm run watch-js
